name: static.
description:
*Game made as a project for CDM 175*

static.

One room. Or at least, I thought.  Four "identical" rooms? Or not. 

Where am I now? Explore the surroundings and figure out what's going on (or what happened).  

The interpretation of static. is based on its presentation, so it's all on your discoveries.

------

  • Controls: 
  • WASD to move
  • Hold SHIFT to sprint
  • SPACE to jump
